caption:
CONSCIOUS ABOUT PACKAGING – We’ve advanced our packaging design across various products as we continue to reduce our impact on the planet.​

+ Shampoo & Conditioner Bottles: 100% recycled bottle and cap.*​

+ Conditioner Tubes: 73% recycled tube and cap.**​

+ Leave-In Treatments: tubes containing FSC-certified paper and using 85% less plastic***​

*Exclude secondary packaging​
**Exclude secondary packaging​
***vs previous 250 ml bottle​

#sustainablepackaging #sustainablehaircare #sustainablehair
